articles.description: All the Premier League latest news including Newcastle, Manchester City, Arsenal and Liverpool news conferences.
articles.title: Premier League returns - news conferences and football latest

articles.description: Dejounte Murray scores in the last second of overtime as the Atlanta Hawks record a second successive win against the Boston Celtics.
articles.title: NBA: Dejounte Murray scores in final second of overtime as Atlanta Hawks beat Boston Celtics

articles.description: Grigor Dimitrov knocks out top seed Carlos Alcaraz to set up a Miami Open semi-final meeting with fourth seed Alexander Zverev.
articles.title: Miami Open: Carlos Alcaraz stunned by Grigor Dimitrov in last eight, but Alexander Zverev through

articles.description: Andy Murray will not compete at April's Monte Carlo Masters and BMW Open after he ruptured ankle ligaments at the Miami Open.
articles.title: Andy Murray: No timescale for three-time Grand Slam champion's return after ankle injury

articles.description: Chelsea's players are talking about doing the unprecedented quadruple this season - but their focus is always on the next game, insists Ashley Lawrence.
articles.title: 'It's always there' - quadruple on Chelsea minds

articles.description: Bringing Xabi Alonso to Bayern Munich this summer is "probably impossible", says the club's honorary president Uli Hoeness.
articles.title: Getting Alonso 'probably impossible' - Bayern chief

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Gladiators star Bionic to make predictions for this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Gladiators star Bionic

articles.description: England overcome a spirited performance from New Zealand to win the fifth and final T20 in Wellington and wrap up a 4-1 series win.
articles.title: England claim victory over New Zealand in final T20

articles.description: Fourth seed Elena Rybakina moves into the Miami Open final for the second straight year with a dramatic win over Victoria Azarenka.
articles.title: Miami Open: Elena Rybakina beats Victoria Azarenka to reach final

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler wins his first Premier League Darts night with a 6-4 win over Nathan Aspinall in Belfast.
articles.title: Luke Littler beats Nathan Aspinall to win Premier League Darts night nine in Belfast
